author: Staff Reporter
text: A team of surgeons at Global Hospitals has successfully performed heart and lung transplants on two patients. Kalyan, 42, from Andhra Pradesh, had end-stage lung disease, said Rahul Chandola, senior consultant, heart and lung transplant surgeon. The surgeons said that in the case of Ramesh, a 43-year-old resident of Chennai who had severe heart failure, his condition had deteriorated to a stage where he had liver cirrhosis as well. Both the transplants were performed in September and October last and the patients were now recovering well, the team said.
title: Successful heart, lung transplants performed
